name: The Collector
passive: Death and Taxes: If you deal damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health, execute them. Champion takedowns grant 25 bonus gold.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Armor. Passive effect: If you deal damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health, execute them. Champion takedowns grant 25 bonus gold.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The penetration helps maintain damage relevance as the game progresses
Great for assassins looking to eliminate priority targets
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
